title: 关于冒险大陆T8的问题
author: Forever_小树
txt_content: 没说清楚=。=创建计分板也只能使用给出的CB

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
标题: 关于冒险大陆T8的问题恩，帖子没有写不能发到这里
于是就来问问
T8
计分板
/scoreboard objectives add time dummy
ABC
DEF
GHI
A
/scoreboard players set @a time 0
B
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:100d}],ArmorItems:[0:{id:minecraft:iron_boots,Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{}},1:{id:minecraft:iron_leggings,Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{}},2:{id:minecraft:iron_chestplate,Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{}},3:{id:minecraft:golden_helmet,Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{Unbreakable:1,display:{Name:"王冠"}}}],HandItems:[0:{id:minecraft:iron_sword,Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{}},1:{id:minecraft:shield,Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{}}],ArmorDropChances:[0:0F,1:0F,2:0F,3:1F],HandDropChances:[0:0F,1:0F],CustomName:"僵尸之王",CustomNameVisible:1,Tags:[0:"zombie"]}
C
/execute @e[tag=zombie] ~ ~ ~ /scoreboard players add @a time 1
D
testfor @a[score_time_min=600,score_time=660]
E
testfor @a[score_time_min=540,score_time=700]
F
testfor @a[score_time_min=700]
G
execute @a[score_time_min=600,score_time=680] ~ ~ ~ /execute @e[tag=zombie] ~ ~ ~ /effect @a[r=15] minecraft:blindness 2 255 true
H
/execute @e[tag=zombie] ~ ~ ~ /execute @a[r=15] ~ ~ ~ /particle portal ~ ~ ~ 0 0 0 1 10
I
/scoreboard players set @a time 0
Score：8

请问是哪儿的问题






@FHC红石 @ItIsEnderman @Forever_小树

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
Forever_小树 发表于 2016-8-3 07:54
可能是题面没说清楚=。=创建计分板也只能使用给出的CB
如果这样的话我就要用OOC了(╯‵□′)╯︵┻━┻

replies.author: Forever_小树
replies.txt_content: 你再思考一下吧(～￣▽￣)～反正每人每题有两次机会，重新回答也可以补齐奖励的

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
创建积分版也需要在所给cb里

你可以试试压缩一下 或者利用把一个循环当一个普通cb用 就是设置上面的方块为普通cb 然后auto1 command自己写233 然后就成功把一个循环变成一个普通的了

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
D
testfor @a[score_time_min=600,score_time=660]
探测玩家分数在600-660
G
execute @a[score_time_min=600,score_time=680] ~ ~ ~ /execute @e[tag=zombie] ~ ~ ~ /effect @a[r=15] minecraft:blindness 2 255 true
在分数为600-680的玩家处执行指令
不应该是600-660吗？
还有H
/execute @e[tag=zombie] ~ ~ ~ /execute @a[r=15] ~ ~ ~ /particle portal ~ ~ ~ 0 0 0 1 10
技能发动前玩家无论在哪都应该有提示，而你填了r=15???
